pullrequest.title: restore old name for URDF collision bodies to fix #758

content.raw:
With minor note that the old [PR2 stuff](https://code.ros.org/svn/wg-ros-pkg/stacks/pr2_common/trunk/pr2_description/urdf/gripper_v0/gripper.gazebo.xacro) looks for `_geom` extension.

In general, URDF does not require names for collisions or visuals, while SDF needs them.  But relying on hard-coded naming scheme is probably a bad idea.
content.html:
With minor note that the old PR2 stuff looks for _geom extension.

In general, URDF does not require names for collisions or visuals, while SDF needs them. But relying on hard-coded naming scheme is probably a bad idea.
